hibernate-mapping.sql-query: call SEM.SEM_SP_MIR010_PAY(?, :paymentGroupNo, :vendorCode, :payeeMasterId, :invoiceNo, cast(:excAmt as numeric), cast(:vatAmt as numeric), cast(:whtAmt as numeric), cast(:dutyAmt as numeric), :paymentType, :paymentMethod, cast(:chqDt as date), cast(:chqReceiveDt as date), cast(:transferDt as date), :remark, :userId, :contractNo)
